files:
- patch107: http://heretics-hexens.ucoz.com/ht2_ep_v1-07.7z
- fg: https://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/static/ffmpeg-20190508-06ba478-win64-static.zip
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Heretic%20II/script.bat
- cdrt: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/cdrtoolswin/1.0/Binaries/CDR-Tools.exe
- zpbin: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/gnuwin32/zip/3.0/zip-3.0-bin.zip
- zpdep: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/gnuwin32/zip/3.0/zip-3.0-dep.zip
- uzpbin: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/gnuwin32/unzip/5.51-1/unzip-5.51-1-bin.zip
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_14_build.rar
game:
  args: /r:0
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: h2_setup.exe
- task:
    description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at
      their defaults
    executable: $DISC/h2_setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/patch/
    src: patch107
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/patch/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/patch/ht2_ep_v1-07.7z
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: zpbin
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: zpdep
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: uzpbin
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: fg
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/bin
    format: Nsis
    src: cdrt
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/bin
    src: $CACHE/bin/
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/
    src: script
- task:
    args: c:\\tmp\\script.bat
    description: Working to make this game more Linux Wine friendly
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/syswow64/wineconsole.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    src: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        coord0: 3
        dflag0: 0
        dflag1: 0
        fakec0: null
        faked0: null
        filterid0: 0
        filterid1: 0
        flag0: 136314880
        flagg0: 134217744
        flagh0: 20
        flagi0: 136347652
        flagj0: 4096
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 16777220
        flago0: 0
        icon0: 
        icon1: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresh1: 0
        initresw0: 800
        initresw1: 0
        initts0: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Heretic II\heretic2.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: 7
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        module0: null
        module1: null
        monitorid0: -1
        monitorid1: 0
        notes0: null
        opengllib0: null
        opengllib1: null
        path0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Heretic II\heretic2.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        registry0: null
        renderer0: 1
        renderer1: 3
        scanline0: 0
        scanline1: 1
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Heretic II\
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: HERETICII
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
      window:
        exepath: C:\Program Files (x86)\Heretic II\
        expert: 1
        exportpath: C:\dxwnd\exports\
        iconview: 1
        posx: 701
        posy: 242
        sizx: 320
        sizy: 224
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
system:
  env:
    MESA_EXTENSION_MAX_YEAR: 2003
    __GL_ExtensionStringVersion: 17700
